name: CITIES DIELINES
description:
Have you ever thought about creating a city and then destroying it? now you have such an opportunity!  in "cities-dielines" you can build your city using the buildings from the available list and then destroy them! how?.....here is some examples:

-THROW A BIG METEORIT ON YOU'RE CITY!

-THROW A NUCLEAR BOMB ON YOU'RE CITY!

-OR USE A BIOLOGICAL WEPON!

-OR EVEN BURN THE CITY!

(this game version is only prototype so in this version you only can build 1 type of building and at the moment you can't destroy the city.  this features coming soon!)

-------------------------------------------

minimum requirements:  windows 7 / 8 /10 or  OS X 10.7+ , PowerPoint 2007+

Recommended Requirements: windows 10 or macOS 10.15 , PowerPoint 2016+

remember, the game is only a prototype ,a lot has not been added and there are many bugs, thanks for understanding!

-------------------------------------------

bugs? you can report! try to use our new feedback site! :

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScWqXA2KNZpwMlo0CFO-ldFMMw3yut61lbAuAIhieAuCcK4Xw/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1
